---
name: Feature request
about: Propose a protocol, operational, or implementation improvement
title: "feat: "
labels: ["enhancement"]
assignees: []
---

## Problem

What gap or failure mode are you trying to address?

## Proposed change

Describe the change in terms of:

- Service behavior
- Operational impact
- Security / trust impact

## Acceptance criteria

- [ ] Test or validation plan
- [ ] Documentation updates
- [ ] Operational or deployment impact documented
